sentences.en: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: Anna pulled a funny face at the girl.
sentences.cn: 安娜朝女孩做了个滑稽的鬼脸。

sentences.en: As the project comes to an end, many workers now face an uncertain future.
sentences.cn: 随着工程结束，许多工人现在前途未卜。

sentences.en: Customers who arrange overdrafts will face a monthly charge of £5.
sentences.cn: 透支的客户每月要缴纳5英镑的费用。

sentences.en: Emergency services are facing additional problems this winter.
sentences.cn: 今年冬天，应急服务机构面临更多难题。

sentences.en: Haley studied her, an enigmatic smile on his face.
sentences.cn: 黑利打量着她，脸上带着神秘的笑容。

sentences.en: Harrer was one of the first to climb the north face of the Eiger.
sentences.cn: 哈勒是第一批登上艾格尔山北坡的人之一。

sentences.en: He came to me with a very long face.
sentences.cn: 他拉长了脸来找我。

sentences.en: he could step aside now without loss of face.
sentences.cn: 他现在可以体面地让位了。

sentences.en: he lay face down on his bed.
sentences.cn: 他趴在床上。

sentences.en: He must face the prospect of financial ruin.
sentences.cn: 他必须面对破产的可能性。

sentences.en: he was putting a brave face on it but she knew he was shattered.
sentences.cn: 虽然他强作欢颜，但她知道他伤心极了。

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: he's just disappeared &B{off the face of the earth}.
sentences.cn: 他从地球上消失得无影无踪。

sentences.en: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.cn: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.en: her resolution in the face of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 她面对敌人时的决心。

sentences.en: her resolution in the face of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 她面对敌人时的决心。

sentences.en: His hair was disheveled, and his face was unshaven and gray.
sentences.cn: 他头发凌乱，没刮胡子，脸色苍白。

sentences.en: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.cn: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.en: I had a great time going out clubbing and getting off my face.
sentences.cn: 我在外集会结社，喝得醉醺醺的，愉快极了。

sentences.en: If he is found guilty, he faces up to 12 years in jail.
sentences.cn: 要是他被判有罪，就将面临最多12年的刑期。

sentences.en: if your face didn't fit they could get rid of you within twelve months.
sentences.cn: 如果你不合要求，他们会在12个月内解雇你。

sentences.en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
sentences.cn: 头枕垫子仰卧。

sentences.en: McManus is facing the biggest challenge of his career.
sentences.cn: 麦克马纳斯正面临着事业上的最大挑战。

sentences.en: place the panel face up before cutting.
sentences.cn: 将板面朝上放，然后切割。

sentences.en: Sarah came forward with a tight and angry face.
sentences.cn: 萨拉走上前来，紧绷着脸，怒气冲冲。

sentences.en: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.cn: 她面容秀美。

sentences.en: She looked him full in the face as she spoke.
sentences.cn: 她说话的时候直盯着他的脸。

sentences.en: She sipped the wine. Everything was hazy now, except for Nick's face.
sentences.cn: 她小口地抿着酒。现在一切都变得模糊起来，除了尼克的脸。

sentences.en: she slammed the door in my face.
sentences.cn: 她对着我砰地关上了门。

sentences.en: She was thin and spare, with a sharply intelligent face.
sentences.cn: 她又高又瘦，一副精明过人的模样。

sentences.en: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: the difficulties faced by the police
sentences.cn: 警方面临的困难

sentences.en: the most gruelling training &B{on the face of the earth}.
sentences.cn: 地球上最最严格的训练。

sentences.en: The President faces the difficult task of putting the economy back on its feet.
sentences.cn: 总统面临着恢复经济的艰巨任务。

sentences.en: The winner will face the Oakland A's in the playoffs this weekend.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将在本周末的季后赛中对阵奥克兰运动者队。

sentences.en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentences.cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentences.en: We'll face a tough fight in the upcoming election.
sentences.cn: 在即将到来的选举中，我们将面临一场恶斗。

words.tran_cn: 有某种面孔或表情的；有…表面的
匿名的，不知名的；无个性的；无脸面的
面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的
意外打击；（拳击中）面部所受的突然一击；铣刀盘

phrases.tran_cn: n. 煤的采掘现场；因开采而露出的煤面
勇敢地面对困难；接受应得的惩罚
面值，票面价值；表面价值

phrases.phrase: have the face to do something

phrases.tran_cn: 针对某人；迎面；当某人走近时

phrases.phrase: make (或 pull) a face (或 faces)
phrases.tran_cn: 耷拉着脸；板起脸；做鬼脸（或怪相）
(非正式)醉醺醺；因吸毒而恍惚
从…字面上看；从…外表上判断

phrases.phrase: put a brave (或 bold 或 good) face on something
phrases.tran_cn: 强作欢颜，掩饰；若无其事地对待某事
［用于强调或夸张人或物的存在或消失］地球表面
工作面；施工面；回采工祖

trans.tran_cn: 脸（面），面貌，山侧，表盘，方面
trans.tran_en: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are
the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are
to be opposite someone or something, or to be looking or pointing in a particular direction

trans.tran_cn: 面向； 面对， 朝； 正视； 面临
trans.tran_en: if you face or are faced with a difficult situation, or if a difficult situation faces you, it is going to affect you and you must deal with it
